title: Embed a Voice AI Agent into Your Website with iMash
lede: This guide explains how to build a Voice AI Agent in iMash and embed it into your website as a widget or popup, with options for text, voice, and avatar-based interactions.

steps.title: Create a New Agent
steps.content:
1. Navigate to AI Agents and click Create New Agent.
  2. Replace the default prompt with a specialised prompt tailored to your product.
  3. Optionally connect a Knowledge Base of FAQs for more accurate responses.
  4. Select a model (e.g., Gemini) and choose a suitable voice provider.

steps.title: Enable Website Widget
steps.content:
1. In the agent configuration, enable the Website Widget.
  2. Select the interaction type:
    • Text and Voice only
    • Avatar (Avatar-only or side-by-side)

steps.title: Configure Widget Design
steps.content:
• Theme: Choose light or dark mode.
  • Display Mode:
    • Widget: Small window docked to a screen corner.
    • Popup: Full modal in the centre of the screen.
  • Placement: Select bottom-right or copy the embed code for manual placement in your HTML.
  • Behaviour: Choose whether the agent starts speaking automatically or waits until the widget is opened.

steps.title: Preview Widget
steps.content:
1. After making changes, click Update Widget Preview to refresh the demo.
  2. Test both widget and popup modes to see how they look.
  3. Switch between voice-only and avatar options to preview different interaction styles.

steps.title: Embed Agent into Website
steps.content:
1. Copy the embed code provided in the widget settings.
  2. Paste it into your websiteâ€™s HTML where you want the agent to appear (e.g., landing page).
  3. Reload your website to see the agent live.
  4. Test by asking product questions and verifying the responses.
